DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety and activity of ART-123 in reducing death in subjects with sepsis and disseminated intravascular coagulation.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Look at the Effects of ART-123 on Patients With Sepsis and Disseminated Intravascular Coagulation (DIC)
DOC.criteria: 1. Bacterial or suspected bacterial infection 2. Presents with 2 or more sepsis related SIRS criteria within 24hours prior to any particular qualifying DIC score. 1. Pregnant 2. Unwilling to allow transfusion of blood or blood products 3. Body weight> or equal to 175kg.
